item.title: Rubio, in Europe, says US has to 'reset the global order of trade' and Trump is 'absolutely right to do it'
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the U.S. has "to reset the global order of trade" and that President Donald Trump is "absolutely right to do it."
